sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import setAlert from '../../action/aleart'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './bus.css'; const Buses = () => { return (
Available Buses
Hello world
Laxmi bus service
Available seats
Raj kalpana travels pvt. ltd

With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.

Available seats

{buses.length} Buses found From {bus.from.city} To {bus.to.city}

{bus.busName}

Type:

{bus.busType}

Policy : {bus.policy}

{/* 2 */}

{bus.arrivalTime}

FROM :{bus.from.city}

{bus.departureTime}

TO : {bus.to.city}

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

{/* 3 */}
{' '}

5

booked Tickets

500

{/* 4 */}

Seat Available

Book Seat

) } export default connect(null, { setAlert })(Buses);
